---
title: "PE Ratio Analysis"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

options(scipen = 999)

dat <- read_csv("nasdaq_stock_data.csv")

dat %>% 
    arrange(desc(`P/E Ratio`))

dat %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = `P/E Ratio`)) +
    geom_histogram() + 
    scale_x_continuous(trans = "log10")
```
